sqlMap.select:
/* NEDMWEB0230.EDI_RETURN_SELECT_01 */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT M1.RRL_REQ_NO , M1.VEN_CD , P1.VEN_NM , M1.PROD_CD , M1.SRCMK_CD , M1.PROD_NM , M1.STR_CD , S1.STR_NM , M1.PROD_STD , M1.ORD_IPSU , M1.ORD_UNIT , M1.STD_SALE_PRC , M1.STD_BUY_PRC , M1.RRL_QTY , (M1.STD_BUY_PRC * RRL_QTY) AS STD_PROD_PRC , M1.REG_STS_CD , S2.CD_NM REG_STS_CD_NM , S2.CD_DESC REG_STS_CD_DETAIL FROM TPC_PO_RRL_PROD M1 INNER JOIN TPC_PO_RRL_MST P1 ON M1.RRL_DY = P1.RRL_DY AND M1.VEN_CD = P1.VEN_CD AND M1.RRL_REQ_NO = P1.RRL_REQ_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE S1 ON M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TPC_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD = 'WPO09' AND M1.REG_STS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD INNER JOIN TPC_PO_EMP_VENDOR SS ON SS.EMP_NO = #empNo# AND SS.VEN_CD = M1.VEN_CD WHERE M1.RRL_DY BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate# AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
S1.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.PROD_CD = #prodCd#
ORDER BY S1.STR_NM, M1.PROD_CD ) A ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #startRowNo# AND #endRowNo#

/* NEDMWEB0230.EDI_RETURN_SELECT_02 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT M1.RRL_REQ_NO , M1.PROD_CD , M1.SRCMK_CD , M1.PROD_NM , S1.STR_NM , M1.ORD_IPSU , M1.ORD_UNIT , M1.STD_SALE_PRC , M1.STD_BUY_PRC , M1.RRL_QTY , (M1.STD_BUY_PRC * RRL_QTY) AS STD_PROD_PRC , M1.REG_STS_CD , S2.CD_NM REG_STS_CD_NM FROM TPC_PO_RRL_PROD M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE S1 ON M1.STR_CD = S1.STR_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TPC_CODE S2 ON S2.MAJOR_CD = 'WPO09' AND M1.REG_STS_CD = S2.MINOR_CD INNER JOIN TPC_PO_EMP_VENDOR SS ON SS.EMP_NO = #empNo# AND SS.VEN_CD = M1.VEN_CD WHERE M1.RRL_DY BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate# AND M1.VEN_CD = #venCd#
M1.STR_CD = #strCd#
S1.AREA_FG = #areaCd#
M1.PROD_CD =#prodCd#
ORDER BY S1.STR_NM, M1.PROD_CD )
